New Records: Nortje achieved career-best bowling figures of 4-7.
Key Match Events: South Africa beat Sri Lanka by six wickets.
de Silva took 2 wickets for 22 runs.
Miller hit a four to seal the win for South Africa.
South Africa restricted Sri Lanka to 77 runs in 19.1 overs.
South Africa chased the target in 16.2 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Markram expressed happiness with the win and acknowledged the tough batting conditions.
Sri Lankan captain Hasaranga mentioned it was a '130-140 run wicket' and emphasized their bowling strength.
Nortje was pleased with his performance and the team's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa went to the top of Group D with this win.
The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
